alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Bossier; Caddo; De Soto; Red River; Webster (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 26 at 7:25AM CDT until June 26 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 AM CDT FOR SOUTHERN WEBSTER...NORTH CENTRAL DE SOTO...NORTHWESTERN RED RIVER...SOUTHERN CADDO...NORTHWESTERN BIENVILLE AND SOUTHERN BOSSIER PARISHES... At 725 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Heflin to near Shreveport, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Shreveport, Bossier City, Minden, Haughton, Greenwood, Stonewall, Ringgold, Sibley, Doyline, Dubberly, Dixie Inn, Heflin, Eastwood, Fosters, Jamestown, Ferguson, Curtis, Fillmore, Cross Lake and Bodcau. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Bienville; Bossier; Caddo; De Soto; Red River; Webster
